remarks: Commutative/associative law for addition and subtraction.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
negidd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
pncand.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
subaddd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
subadd23d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A - B ) + C ) = ( A + ( C - B ) ) ) $.
